oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The role of the teacher as the key to success in a Task-Based Approach to EFL
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: roles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Master Dissertation deals with the role of the teacher in a Task-Based Approach in EFL and the different roles a teacher plays in the classroom by using a communicative approach. It also deals with the analysis of the Course Plan and Learning Unit by focusing on the role of the teacher.
